page.title: Documentation for the MOEA Framework
page.description: Documentation for the MOEA Framework, including the API javadoc

content.p: In addition to the examples included with the source code, additional documentation is provided below. Please consider purchasing a copy of the Beginner's Guide to help support this project. Thank you!

li.span: The API specification for the MOEA Framework lists all classes and methods with complete, detailed documentation. Use this along with the examples available in every download to gain a better understanding of the inner workings of this software.

Browse our tutorials and examples. These can be found online using the links below or under the docs/ and examples/ folders provided with each release. These are replacing the Beginner's Guide to the MOEA Framework manual.
